snippet: Those laid off include the gossip columnist Joanna Molloy; the editorial writers Stephen McFarland and Alexander Nazaryan; the reporters Robert Gearty and Christina Boyle; and the columnist Albor Ruiz.
lead_paragraph: Those laid off include the gossip columnist Joanna Molloy; the editorial writers Stephen McFarland and Alexander Nazaryan; the reporters Robert Gearty and Christina Boyle; and the columnist Albor Ruiz.

headline.seo: Daily News Lays Off About 12 Opinion Writers and Reporters
headline.main: Daily News Lays Off 12 Opinion Writers and Reporters
headline.print_headline: Daily News Lays Off 12 Opinion Writers and Reporters
